group_1.textCenter: So, did you gather us all here for a discussion?

group_1.textRight: In 743... The law pur-mit-ing pri-vat own-err-ship@of new-lee cull-ta-vay-ted land...

group_1.textLeft: A strategy meeting?

group_1.narration: "How can I confess my feelings@to my childhood friend..."

group_1.textRight: ............[wait:0.8][chara:304401:cheek_0][chara:304401:lipSynch_1]What?
...Okay, hang on a sec.@Can you run that by me one more time?

group_1.textLeft: How can I confess my feelings@to my childhood friend...

group_1.textRight: Oh, alright.@I guess I didn't mishear you.
Could it have something to do with how...
Sakuya's been reading romance articles lately～?

group_1.textLeft: You know about that too, huh?

group_1.textRight: [chara:304401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! Seriously?!
Sakuya, are you in love with someone?!
That's hilarious!
Spill it! Who are you into?!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, this isn't about me!
It's one of my juniors who has a crush on someone!

group_1.textRight: What the hell? That's boring.
But why do we
have to give strangers tips on their love lives～?

group_1.textLeft: Well, because...
...Which is why I need help.
I'd like to hear what kind of advice you guys would@give.

group_1.textRight: I get it now～@Sure, why not?
If you can't concentrate on things,@you'll run into trouble～
Then let's just get it over with.
We don't have much time for this, either.

group_1.textLeft: Right.@First of all, I'd like to know the preconditions.
...What sort of relationship does she have@with her childhood friend at the moment...?

group_1.textRight: They're just good friends...@Or something along those lines.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.
Does anyone have an opinion to share?

group_1.textRight: I do!
I think it's best to be straightforward@about your feelings!
If you don't put it into words, they won't understand.
Mm～ That's true, buuuut...
It's scary to risk breaking off a relationship@with a childhood friend, isn't it?
I'd be more careful if I were her～
If you wait too long, you're gonna get a Game Over.
"Love is war", you know!
If you don't go for it, someone else will snatch them@up.
I say she'll have to cross that bridge@when she gets to it.
If she wants them to stay childhood friends,@she can't go out with them, see.

group_1.textLeft: You've got a lot of perspective on this, Urara.

group_1.textRight: It's better to give up than confess and get hurt.

group_1.textLeft: Hrmm...
What do you think, Juri?

group_1.textRight: "In spring, the dawn...is gradually turning white?"@[chara:102401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102401:cheek_0][chara:102401:face_mtn_ex_021.exp.json][chara:102401:motion_100][chara:102401:eyeClose_0][chara:102401:lipSynch_1]...No it ain't...!

group_1.textLeft: Juri!

group_1.textRight: Yeah?! You gotta kick their ass!
And don't chicken out! That's all!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, so you were paying attention, huh?

group_1.textRight: She's not going to "kick their ass"...

group_1.textLeft: Yes. For Sakuya's sake, we can't allow this to fail...

group_1.textRight: Well, jumping in without any kind of flags first
would be a pretty dumbass decision, yeah?
She was lamenting that she wasn't being seen@as a romantic interest to begin with.

group_1.textLeft: ...If that's how it is,@then perhaps she should start there.
I think she should first work on getting herself@perceived as a potential love interest.
Childhood friendships are...
Difficult in that way, I'm sure.

group_1.textRight: That's a good point...!
How far has your little junior gotten@in the first place～?

group_1.textLeft: How far...?

group_1.textRight: From what it sounds like, the two of them@might not have even gone on a date yet.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... As far as I know, they haven't.

group_1.textRight: Then that's definitely step one!
In dating sims, it's a bad idea to confess to someone@before you've even gone out together.
That's a straight shot to the Bad End for being@tactless～
She should change her goal from "confessing to her@childhood friend" to "asking them on a date".
Mm-hm. If you've got it now,@then get going and pass it along to her!

group_1.textLeft: Alright! Thank you, everyone!
I'm gonna go clear up everyone's misunderstandings,@'kay?
Guess that settles this～
Oh...

group_1.textRight: ...Is it your parents again?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.
Ao...

group_1.textRight: Hm? What is it, Sister?

group_1.textLeft: To be honest, the reason I called you all here...
wasn't only to help with Sakuya's problem.
Now it's time to tell me about yours...
